altTitles.ja: クソ女に幸あれ

description.en:
"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
description.es-la: "Te he estado engañando. Ah, y no es sólo un chico. Son tres. Lo siento". En la secundaria, la primera novia de Akiyoshi Sunao le destrozó el corazón y renunció al amor. Sin embargo, todo eso cambia cuando se enamora de una chica en el club de cine de su universidad. Justo cuando finalmente comienza a dejar atrás el pasado, se topa con su exnovia. Lo que no sabe es que esto es sólo el comienzo... ¡Para su horror, se despierta en su cuerpo a la mañana siguiente!
description.pt-br: "Eu tenho te traído. Ah, e não é apenas um cara. São três. Desculpe por isso." De volta ao ensino médio, o primeiro amor de Akiyoshi Sunao despedaçou seu coração, e ele jurou evitar o amor. No entanto, tudo muda quando ele se apaixona por uma garota no clube de cinema da universidade. Justo quando ele está começando a superar o passado, ele esbarra com sua ex-namorada. Mal sabe ele que isso é apenas o começo... Para seu horror, ele acorda no corpo dela na manhã seguinte!

title.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten: After the Rain

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件 after the rain

altTitles.ja-ro: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken: After the Rain

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais: After the Rain

description.en: A spin-off of the series *[The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten](https://mangadex.org/title/2fec6641-beb1-4ae9-a32f-204dd06688ac/the-angel-next-door-spoils-me-rotten)* which comicalizes the stories from Volume 5.5 of the Light Novel and its special edition booklet, which contains additional short stories.

altTitles.ja: ひまりのまわり

description.en: Aizawa Haruki, 16 years old, is in his 2nd year of high school, and likes to live efficiently. One day during summer vacation, a girl, Aizawa Himari, suddenly appears, calling him 'Onii-chan' and claiming that she's his little sister. As it turns out, Haruki's father recently remarried, and his new wife brought a daughter with her. However, since both of their parents are overseas, it'll only be the two of them living under the same roof. And for some reason, Himari seems very obstinate about spending as much time with Haruki as she can.

Yul, the manager of the interdimensional dump truck office, accidentally kills an innocent man named Kwon Yoo-jun. In order to make amends, Yul enters a romance fantasy novel where Yoo-jun is the villainess and tries to send her back to her original world. However, due to various complications, Yul becomes trapped in the novel. With the office staff scattered and no knowledge of the novel's plot, Yul desperately searches for a way out. But, Yoo-jun, who is now pretending to be a noble lady in the new world, causes Yul a headache.
Marcus has a crush, and Cog is completely unprepared for the hijinks that follow. Hopefully in their efforts to grow closer, they can brighten each other's day.
description.pt-br: Marcus tem uma queda por Cog e Cog está completamente despreparado para as travessuras que se seguem. Esperançosamente, em seus esforços para se aproximarem, eles podem iluminar o dia um do outro.

altTitles.ja: 愛囚ラヴァ

description.en: In a world where people suddenly developed super-powers, those who used their abilities to do evil are held at Catastrophe Prison. Shu Ono, a guard at the prison, somehow fell in love with the strongest female prisoner Lava! A crazy love-comedy about the forbidden relationship between guard and prisoner!
description.es-la: Un mundo en el que las personas desarrollan repentinamente habilidades diferentes. Los que utilizan sus habilidades para hacer el mal son encarcelados en una prisión de catastrófica. Shu Ono, que trabaja allí como guardia, se enamora de algún modo de la prisionera más fuerte, ¡Lava!

description.en:
Eiji Matsuda has his heart set on a University student he met through his job... Well, more accurately, he has his heart set on her *body.*

After six months of him waiting, she finally accepts being his girlfriend, under one condition: there's no sex allowed. Will Eiji be able to keep his cool around all of her provocations?!

altTitles.ja: 冗談だろ…
地味な女主任がメガネ外したら超美人だった話

altTitles.ja-ro: Jimina jo Shunin ga Megane Hazushitara chou Bijin Datta Hanashi

description.en:
**Notes:**
- This series was originally started in [2022](https://twitter.com/k_sanjo/status/1517703053922680833). However, the official raw links to a higher quality release that came out later.

title.en: Sex Kakumei Okoshimasen ka? ~Nazo no dokushin Kizoku ni Kareshi Sengen saremashita~

altTitles.zh: 来掀起一场性爱革命吧～被谜之单贵族宣示主权～

altTitles.zh-hk: 來掀起一場性愛革命吧

altTitles.ja: セックス革命起こしませんか? ~謎の独身貴族に彼氏宣言されました~
GIGANTIS―ジャイガンティス―

description.en:
On that day, humanity was turned into “prey”―Gen is a high school student living on the island of Tsushima, a door to mainland Japan.

Along with his sickly sister, Misaki, and his heartwarming mother, Gen was living a peaceful life, all until an “asymmetrical monster” appears on the island. All hell breaks loose on the island of Tsushima.

These monsters devour everything from plants to animals, to humans, and mutate together. Will humanity stand a chance against these mutant creatures? Is there any hope?
description.uk:
Того дня людство було перетворено на «здобич».
Ґен — старшокласник, який живе на острові Цушіма, що є дверима до материкової Японії.
Разом зі своєю хворобливою сестрою Місакі та чарівною матір'ю Ґен жив мирним життям, поки на острові не з'явився «асиметричний монстр».

Після цього на острові Цушіма починається пекло.

Ці монстри пожирають все, від рослин до тварин і людей. Після цього мутують.
Чи матиме людство шанс протистояти цим істотам-мутантам?
Є якась надія?

altTitles.ja: 僕のダイヤモンド・スター

description.en:
Takuma is an ordinary first-year high school boy from the countryside who happens to be a (male) idol otaku. He spends all his free time working part-time in hopes of one day seeing his favorite idol live in concert. However, one day, his favorite idol Kei suddenly suspends all public appearances due to "health problems." Takuma is devastated by the news, until one day when Kei himself moves into the house next door…

“I want to help. If there’s anything I can do, please let me know.”

“There’s nothing you can do.”

altTitles.ja: Fate/Prototype 蒼銀のフラグメンツ

description.en: An adaptation of the novel *Fate/Prototype: Sougin no Fragments*.
description.fr:
Adaptation manga du light novel *Fate/Prototype -Fragments d'Azur et d'Acier-* de Hikaru Sakurai et Nakahara

Manaka Sajô est issue d'une puissante famille de mages et est considérée comme un véritable prodige. C'est donc naturellement qu'elle est choisie pour participer à l'une des Guerre du Saint Graal.
Malgré son jeune âge, elle parvient à invoquer le plus puissant des Servant : Saber. Mais leur relation va très vite se dégrader car ils n'ont pas du tout la même conception du monde et de la guerre.

altTitles.ja: ロマンティック・ダーク

description.en: Neo, who is about to make his major debut in the band, gets constantly injured. A traffic accident that happened for three days in a row, a mysterious high fever and him constanly falling down the stairs... The manager ordered me to remove the curse, and the one I was heading towards was a pretty girl- "Yoyo". "I'll help you find the mystery of your destiny", the girl spoke, while stepping into my life. A bandman with a mysterious attraction, musician x a spirit, who only seeks to find the mystery of fate. The most terrifying mix of love and horror!?? The duo's occultic love has begun!

altTitles.ja: ロックマンさん

description.ar: بعد انتهاء القتال مع وايلي روكمان يخوض معركة جديدة كطبيب اسنان في العالم الحقيقي
description.en: Much time has passed since his battle with Dr. Wily, and Rockman has grown up in a peaceful world. Working as a dentist at the dental clinic opened by Dr. Right, Rockman struggles in his daily life with the allies he once fought with!

title.en: Kao Dake ja Suki ni Narimasen

altTitles.en: I Won't Fall for Him Just Because of His Face

altTitles.zh: 只靠脸的话才不会喜欢上你呢

altTitles.ja: 顔だけじゃ好きになりません

altTitles.en: It Takes More than a Pretty Face to Fall in Love

description.en:
As an incoming freshman, Chiken Sana chose to attend Minowa Sougou High School for its flexible school policies and also because her “eye candy” - Ugou Kanato - is rumored to be a student there. When she finally meets him due to a series of coincidences, she gets pulled into something unexpected…?!  
  
What will happen next in this ultra fast-paced love comedy?!

**Links:**
description.fr: Sana Chiken est une nouvelle élève de première année qui a choisi le lycée Minowa Sougou en raison de sa politique flexible mais aussi du fait que Kanato Ugou, un étudiant mignon, aurait été élève ici. C'est alors que Sana le croise par hasard et se retrouve dans une situation inattendu à cause de lui.
description.pt-br: Uma caloura recém entrada, Chiken Sana escolheu estudar na escola Minowa Sougou por suas políticas escolares serem flexíveis e também porque seu “colírio para os olhos” - Ugou Kanato - dizem os boatos que é um estudante dessa escola. Quando ela finalmente o conhece devido a uma série de coincidências, ela é puxada para algo inesperado…?! O que vai acontecer a seguir nesta comédia de amor ultrarrápida?!

title.en: When I Woke up, I Had Become the Villainess

altTitles.ja: 目が覚めたら、悪役令嬢になっていた

title.en: Ore no Kouhai ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai

altTitles.en: My Kouhai Can't Be This Cute

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Kōhai ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai
Ore no Kouhai ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai

altTitles.ja: 俺の後輩がこんなに可愛いわけがない

description.en: Ore No Kouhai ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai follows the experiences of Ruri Gokou and Kyousuke Kousaka, as they both begin to explore the feelings that they have for each other. Will they be able to acknowledge their feelings for each other, or will they reach a standstill in their pursuit of happiness?

title.en: JK Haru is a Sex Worker in Another World

altTitles.ja-ro: JK Haru wa Isekai de Shofu ni natta

altTitles.ja: JKハルは異世界で娼婦になった

altTitles.zh: 女高中生小春在异世界成为娼妓
女高中生小春在异世界成为游女

altTitles.ru: Старшеклассница Хару стала проституткой в другом мире

description.en:
Haru Koyama was an ordinary student until a moron classmate got them both in a terrible accident. 
Now Haru has been transported to another world where only men are allowed to be adventurers. 
Determined to make the most of it, she takes a job in the Blue Cat Nocturne brothel to make a living 
the only way she knows how. No cheat abilities, no powers, just her quick wits and naughty bits!

title.en: Jojoni Deremi ga Mashiteku Tsundere Gyaru

altTitles.ja: 徐々にデレ味が増してくツンデレギャル

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng gal tsundere ngày càng đáng yêu hơn

altTitles.ja-ro: Jojoni Deremi ga Mashiteku Tsundere Gal
Jojoni Deremi ga Mashiteku Tsundere Gyaru

altTitles.tr: Tsundere Gal Günden Güne Daha Sevimli Hale Geliyor

altTitles.en: The Tsundere Gal Whose Dere Side Gradually Increases

altTitles.ja: 謎の彼女Ｘ

description.en:
One day, a strange transfer student appears before Tsubaki. Urabe Mikoto is an antisocial girl, whose hobby is just sleeping during class-breaks. 
One day, Tsubaki goes to wake her up and accidentally tastes her drool… And gets hooked on that!  
  
After that, he starts going out with her and gets to know her better. Her second hobby, as it turns out, is carrying around scissors in her panties 
and cutting paper into flowers… or whatever else is getting on her nerves…

altTitles.ja: 富江 コントロール

description.en: New Tomie one-shot published in the josei magazine Nemuki+

altTitles.ja: 会社と私生活

description.en:
A Twitter series about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/4729811/series/198059)
description.es-la: Los colegas con diferentes personalidades tienen una vida privada donde uno se viste como una lolita y el otro se viste como una persona funky goath.

altTitles.ja: ダンス・ダンス・ダンスール

description.en:
Junpei is happily snoozing away during his sister's ballet recital when a male ballet dancer steps onto the stage. Moved by the strength and skills the dancer displays, the boy discovers his love for this art.  
  
But after a certain tragedy happens, he vows to leave his past behind and turn into the epitome of manliness. What will he do when his love for ballet reignites?!

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女201

description.en: Fujiyama Shinobu aka Sexy Fujiyama, is a general working for the evil Flower Bud Gang who are trying to take over the city. Standing in her way is the masked magical girl, Princess Mamu, who wouldn't you know it, has just moved in next door to Fujiyama's place...

altTitles.ja: 極道楽園
極道パラダイス

description.en:
The 18-year-old Taro Sato, who had no dreams or goals and was leading a lazy life, is scouted by chance to be a driver for a yakuza boss. Taro is at the mercy of the yakuza gang leader's life, which has suddenly begun. Can he become a "cool guy" like his gang leader?!

This is a genuine gangster story that pursues realism to the extreme!

altTitles.en: Negative Hero and Demon King's General

altTitles.ja: ネガティブ勇者と魔王軍幹部

altTitles.pt-br: A heroína negativa e o general do rei demônio

altTitles.id: Pahlawan Negatif dan Kepala Pasukan Iblis

altTitles.ru: Депрессивный герой и повелитель армии демонов

altTitles.zh-hk: 消極勇者與魔王軍幹部

altTitles.vi: Anh Hùng Tiêu Cực Và Thống Lĩnh Quân Đoàn Quỷ

description.de: Was passiert, wenn der Held im Schloss des Generals der Dämonen ankommt und weiß, dass sie ihn nicht besiegen kann? Sie weint und wird vom General der Dämonen selbst getröstet!
description.en:
What happens when the hero arrives at the castle of the general of the demons and knows that they wouldn't be able to defeat it? She cries and is comforted by the general of demons himself!

---
**Links:**
- Buy the Physical Volumes: [MelonBooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=455318), [Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/item/040030692701)
description.vi: Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra khi một anh hùng đặt chân vào lâu đài của tướng quỷ và đối mặt với hắn? Cô bé anh hùng của chúng ta lại khóc nức nở và được chính tên quỷ đó dỗ dành!
description.pt-br: O que acontece quando uma heróina chega ao castelo do general do rei dos demônios e sabe que não conseguiria o derrotar? Ela chora e é consolada pelo próprio general do rei dos demônios!

title.en: Imprisoned with the Horror Game's Male Lead

altTitles.en: Confined Together with the Horror Game’s Male Lead

description.en:
I became a maid inside of a horror game.
Penalties were given to the male lead, who was trying to escape being locked up in a large mansion, and I acted as a guide. 

I was going to fulfill my duties until the male lead’s play ends.

“When I get out, I’ll lock you up exactly the same way.”

The male lead is so noisy. 
If it’s going to be like this, I’ll just help him escape faster. 

“Let’s eat, Dietrich.”
“This is a potion, it’ll help you recover faster if you take it.”
“The hint to escape is over there…”

I fed him well to prepare for the next play, and when the male lead got hurt, I gave him a potion so he could quickly play the next game,
I even gave him a hint for the problem. 

You’ll be able to get out now, right?

However. 

“I don’t really know the answer.”

What’s the meaning of this? Aren’t you supposed to be smart?

…The male lead doesn’t think about leaving the mansion at all. 

“If you won’t get out, I will.”

I shouted in anger because I was so sick of the thought of having to see the face of someone I don’t want to keep seeing. 

“Is it possible for you to get out of here?”

His eyes sank bitterly. 

“Let me tell you this, I have no intention of leaving this place.”
“What?”
“And you have no way of getting out, either.”

What the hell is going on?

altTitles.ja: デビルマンサーガ

description.en: Set in 2025, a roboticist named Fudou Yuuki joins a project involving a large mural depicting humanity's true past as well as the ancient but advanced technology found in Antarctica.

altTitles.ja: ろくでなしBLUES

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

altTitles.ja: ハレンチ学園

description.en:
The first ecchi in history.

Beginning in the first issue of Weekly Shonen Jump (ch 2). The nature of the content is very extreme with both teachers and students being involved in perverted situations. Over the publication, Go Nagai included more extreme content at the encouragement of his editor. As the manga continued its serialization, it garnered more and more controversy from parents. As a result, the Jump Editorial Dept. decided to cancel the serial. 

Nagai, in response to the controversy, decided to end off the manga [End of part 1] with the very infamous "Harenchi War" (Shameless War) arc.

_(spoiler)
The arc kills off the majority of the cast in a very gory and disturbing manner and remains a very infamous arc to this day._


Shameless School is controversial in Japan even today and is regarded as a "traumatic work" by several news publications.

The manga consists of 3 parts, with the last left unfinished due to the cancellation. + last volume includes 3 chapters backstory arc for Bearded Godzilla.

altTitles.ja: 伽藍の姫
伽藍の姫 -がらんのひめ-

description.en: A world where machine civilization has perished and immortal monsters called "Monotsuki" are rampant. Isana, a girl born in a remote village, meets a mechanical person who lost her memories and looks exactly like her sister, who should have disappeared in the ruins she wandered into. Convinced that "My sister is alive," Isana gives the mechanical person the name "Hime" (princess) and together they set out on a journey to find her sister.

title.en: Tomodachi Nano ni Kiss o Shita

altTitles.ja: 友達なのにキスをした

altTitles.en: We Kissed Even Though We Are Just Friends

description.en: Aoi and Keita, who attend the same high school, live next door to each other and have been childhood friends ever since Keita moved in when they were in middle school. Even though they're just friends who always goof around together, Aoi suddenly notices that Keita has been looking cool lately...

altTitles.ja: フェイト／アポクリファ

description.en:
The setting of Fate/Apocrypha is a parallel world to Fate/stay night where the Greater Grail was removed from Fuyuki after the Third Holy Grail War and disappeared for many years. Around the 2000s, around the same time as the Fifth Holy Grail War would have happened, the group that plundered the Grail, Yggdmillennia, openly declares their secession from the Mage's Association and that they are in possession of the Grail. The Association dispatches fifty magi to retrieve it, but all but one are instantly slaughtered by Lancer of Black. The one remaining manages to activate the reserve system of the Greater Grail, allowing for the summoning of fourteen Servants in total.  
  
This marks the start of the Great Holy Grail War in Trifas, featuring two different factions, the Black Faction, whose members are part of Yggdramillennia, and the Red Faction, whose members were sent by the Mage's Association with the exception of one from the Church. The Grail itself also summons Ruler to act as a mediator of the Holy Grail War.
description.ru: События Fate/Apocrypha происходят в мире параллельном миру Fate/stay night, в котором Грааль был убран из города Фуюки после Третьей Войны. История начинается с того, что в Румынии был обнаружен «726-ой Святой Грааль». Его похитила и привезла в Румынию семья Иггдмилленния. Это знаменует начало Великой Войны Святого Грааля в городе Трифас с двумя противоборствующими сторонами: Чёрная Фракция, члены которой являются частью семьи Иггдмилленния и Красная Фракция, члены которой были посланы Ассоциацией Магов, за исключением одного участника от Церкви. Грааль также призывает Рулера выступать в качестве посредника в Войне Святого Грааля.
description.vi:
Nội dung của Fate/Apocrypha vẫn xoay quanh Cuộc Chiến Chén Thánh tại thành phố Fuyuki nhưng diễn ra trong một thế giới song song với thế giới của Fate/Stay Night. Tại đây, sau Cuộc Chiến Chén Thánh lần thứ 3, Đại Chén Thánh của thành phố Fuyuki đã đột ngột biến mất một cách bí ẩn.

Rất lâu sau đó, vào thời điểm những năm 2000, một gia tộc mang tên gọi Yggdmilennia đã công khai việc đánh cắp Chén Thánh của họ đồng thời tách rời khỏi Hiệp Hội Pháp Sư. Để đoạt lại Chén Thánh, Hiệp Hội Pháp Sư đã cử đi 50 thành viên tinh nhuệ nhất của mình nhưng tất cả đều bị Servant Lancer của nhà Yggdmilennia tiêu diệt. Tuy nhiên, người sống sót cuối cùng trong 50 pháp sư đã kịp kích hoạt cơ chế dự phòng của Đại Chén Thánh, được sử dụng nhằm ngăn chặn sự hợp tác giữa các Servant bằng cách cho phép 7 Master và 7 Servant mới được tham gia vào trận chiến. Từ đó mở màn cho cuộc Đại Chiến Chén Thánh với 14 Master cùng 14 Servant tại thành phố Trifas giữa Hắc Trận Doanh – những thành viên của gia tộc Yggdmilennia và Xích Trận Doanh – những Master đại diện cho Hiệp Hội Pháp Sư.

altTitles.ja: 酒と鬼は二合まで

altTitles.ja-ro: Sake to Oni wa Nigou made
Sake to Onna wa Ni-gō made

description.en:
Shida Naori is a college student who loves making alcoholic drinks but has no friends to share them with. At a mixer, she meets Ibuki Hinata, who she ends up taking home with her. After making her a drink, Naori discovers that Hinata is an ogre-girl descended from Shuten-doji who needs alcohol to live, can only drink alcohol offered to her by humans, and grows horns whenever she drinks. Thus, Hinata decides to make Naori her personal bartender.

---

Alternative [Amazon Retail Link](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4757574061) (Physical)

altTitles.ja: アイアムアヒーロー

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

The series has sold over 8.3 million copies! The gold standard of zombie manga, "I Am a Hero," is now available in a "complete edition" with a new cover design, reprinted color pages from the serialization, and over 80 pages of new artwork in the final 22 volumes! Witness the new ending of the story. 

He is 35 year old who spends his time as an assistant to a mangaka, sometimes escaping into delusion in order to win over the agonizing reality. One day, however, a mysterious infection begins to spread without him noticing...and the real world begins to break down...⁉ 

He wanders into a world where the ordinary and the extraordinary, the mundane and the insane intersect. A personal survival panic horror story! 

[Official English](https://www.darkhorse.com/Books/25-142/I-Am-a-Hero-Omnibus-Volume-1-TPB)

---  
- **Won the 58th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2013**

---

- Adapted into a Live Action film in 2016. Link to the [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=24660) Page
description.pl:
Hideo Suzuki to 35­‑latek pracujący jako asystent znanego twórcy mang. Na pozór wydaje się zwyczajnym człowiekiem, balansuje jednak na granicy choroby psychicznej, ma olbrzymie problemy z funkcjonowaniem w społeczeństwie i kontaktach z innymi ludźmi. Jak ktoś taki poradzi sobie w świecie opanowywanym przez zombie?  
 Mangę charakteryzuje bardzo poważne podejście do tematu i zorientowanie na psychikę bohatera oraz analizę ludzkiej osobowości.  
 Yumi - 25 maja 2011
description.pt-br: Hideo Suzuki é um assistente de mangaká de 35 anos de idade lutando para ser um herói em sua própria vida, dividido pelo trabalho na série em que é assistente "lime light" e com uma série nova ao mesmo tempo, equilibrando seu relacionamento com sua namorada e seus próprios delírios. No entanto, tão difícil como Hideo pode imaginar, o mundo parece ter um conjunto de planos diferentes para ele; maquinações sinistras e obscuras que derrubam completamente a sua realidade e como ele a vê.

description.en: Satan's daughter is a succubus who just wants to play video games and chill at home, until one day he gets tired of her lazing about the house, and kicks her out into the human world...

altTitles.ja: Tomo Chan ha Onnanoko!
トモちゃんは女の子!

description.en: Tomo Aizawa was able to successfully confess to her crush Junichirou Kubota. There is only one problem: He just sees her as his buddy. He thought that she was a boy until they went to middle school together, because her grade school was in a different school district.

altTitles.ja: アストロベイビー

description.en: The remote town of North Hill has been quarantined to prevent the spread of the mysterious Couper disease that is turning people into cannibals. Young soldier Billy returns to his hometown for the first time in six years for the woman he loves, but what horrors will be awaiting him...?

altTitles.ja: 荷物持ちの脳筋無双

description.en:
The more he carries, the stronger he becomes! An unmatched fantasy by the weakest adventurer duo!

Ryuk, a boy with a unique skill “Porter,” which allows him to carry a massive amount of items, was being exploited as a chore boy for the S-rank party “Black Lion of Foresight.” One day, the party managed to acquire a storage item more convenient than Ryuk’s skill, thus no longer needed, Ryuk is banished inside a dangerous dungeon. Despairing in this hopeless situation, suddenly he meets a shrine maiden girl, Mio — and then?

Welcome home, Kazu-kun.  
Would you like to have a bath? or dinner? or perhaps…

The two members with the worst relationship in the group are now trending all because of a fan-taken video that suddenly dominated the social media! Young and cute husky X Cool and cold Gege who has great self-restraint?! The shippers are going feral over this pairing! They had clearly never gotten along since their debut, yet they were now forced to embark on an endless path of selling their fake ship together~
description.zh: 队内关系最差的两人，竟因为饭拍视频霸榜热搜！年下小狼狗x清冷禁欲哥哥，CP粉直呼嗑到了！明明出道就不合，却被迫开启漫漫虚假营业路~

title.en: A Childhood Friend Who Is Nice to a Shut-In

altTitles.ja: 引きこもりに優しい幼馴染
クールな同級生の◯◯年後...

altTitles.en: The Cool Classmate XX Years Later...

altTitles.ja: シメジシミュレーション

description.en:
A surreal yet heartwarming 4-koma series about everyday life.  
  
From the author of Shoujo Shuumatsu Ryokou/Girls' Last Tour.
description.fr: Une jeune fille s'est enfermée dans son placard pendant ses 2 dernières années de collège et se rend compte qu'elle doit maintenant passer au lycée. Quand elle sort de son placard pour la première fois en deux ans et se regarde dans le miroir, elle s'aperçoit que des champignons « shimeji » ont commencé à pousser sur sa tête.

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

title.en: Kitsune no Kami-sama no wo Saisen Atsume

altTitles.ja: 狐の神様のおさいせん集め

altTitles.en: Collecting Offerings to the Fox God

title.en: Screw the Noble Life, I’m Going Home

altTitles.en: Noble Lady or Whatever, I'm Going Home

description.en:
After confirming that I had won the lottery, I tried to quit my job! However, as soon as I opened the door, I found myself transmigrated into the body of a noble lady. I have one year to claim the prize money, so I have to return home at all costs. Please wait for me, my 1.7 million won! Mum will be there soon, but... What's wrong with this family?!

"I love you." But I'm not your daughter!

"Sister, you might get hurt so I'll hold you." Did he mean he would lift me? What is this guy, a giant brown bear?

"If you mess with our sister one more time, I'll make you disappear without a trace." He's got a pretty face, but he has a sharp tongue.

"Don't fall ill." Don't worry about me. Why are there so many of them?! I'm not a noble lady! Leave me alone, I wanna go home!

title.en: Nenmatsu Yarinoko Shita Koto ga Aru Hito no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 年末やり残したことがある人の話

description.en: The year has come to an end, but the night is still young.

Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

altTitles.ja: ノンバーバル

description.en: Two of the Gandhi-ji's Three Monkeys
